translations: 将……进行分类（categorise 的过去式及过去分词，categorise 等于 categorize）

sentences.sentence: Decision tree is one of the important Categorising Data Mining methods.
sentences.translation: 决策树是分类数据挖掘的重要方法。

sentences.sentence: Like many shy small boys, he liked collecting, categorising and measuring things.
sentences.translation: 和许多害羞的小男孩一样，他喜欢收集东西，并对它们进行分类和估量。

sentences.sentence: Categorising tasks or project stages conceptually may help an individual or group maintain their focus and achieve greater self-discipline.
sentences.translation: 将任务或者项目阶段概念化分类会有助于个人或者团队维持他们焦点，从而达到更好的自律。
